amendment.description: To prohibit the discharge, in bankruptcy, of a debt resulting from the debtor's unlawful interference with the provision of lawful goods or services or damage to property used to provide lawful goods or services.

action.text: Amendment SA 47 proposed by Senator Schumer.

vote.text: Amendment SA 47 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 53. Record Vote Number: 28.
